resultTable.sql:
insert overwrite table ${result_db}.dm_ct_pm_mr_usr_d partition(p_date='${p_date}')
select substr('${p_start_time}',1,8) as starttime, msisdn as msisdn, avg_rsrp as rsrp_avg, rsrp_tolal_samples_cnt as rsrp_tolal_samples_cnt, rsrp_110_samples_cnt as rsrp_110_samples_cnt from ${source_db}.ç”¨æˆ·æä¾ where p_date>='${p_date_start}' and p_date<'${p_date_end}'
